title: Yummy Schachter previews Amudim’s 36-Hour ‘Unite to Heal’ livestream
description: Israel “Yummy” Schachter tells Arutz Sheva about the massive global livestream he built with Amudim, one of the Jewish world’s largest online awareness events.
content: Israel Yummy Schachter, producer of the Amudim organizations upcoming 36-hour Unite to Heal livestream, spoke with Arutz Sheva - Israel National News about the preparations for what has become one of… [+3589 chars]
